violations.description: No try-catch block found. StripeCardError with error.type === 'card_error' - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST catch StripeCardError and handle gracefully. Display user-friendly message based on error.decline_code. DO NOT retry card_error without user intervention.

violations.description: No try-catch block found. StripeRateLimitError with error.type === 'rate_limit_error' - this will crash the application.
violations.suggested_fix: Caller MUST implement exponential backoff retry logic. Stripe rate limits are per-account, not per-key.
